column2: Some beast of a man (or woman) is murdering citizens in this province. Police have so far failed to apprehend him.
A tract arguing the causes of counter-revolution, order, religion and monarchy has received widespread circulation in our country.
Some local Czech-speaking people have taken up arms against the owners of this province, whom they view as occupiers.
Don't mind me, I'm just reducing spam from the Buffer State event in CBandCores.txt
Because of recent events, natural or otherwise, our country is currently experiencing a famine. Many will die or leave for a new home. Many will demand action.
Because of the famine caused by Eyjafjallajokul's ash, people are more willing to seek greener pastures in the New World. Of those that remain, many will die and many more will demand action.
This province is recovering from a recent natural disaster.
This country is taking part in a civil war against its former rulers.
This police force is active in the country, restoring order.
Our country possesses an army which is the marvel of the entire world!
Our country possesses a navy which is the marvel of the entire world!
This province is still recovering from the recent devastating great fire which swept through one of its cities.

The first to serve as First Councilor of the Republic of Aquitània, Ilmunt was famous for his popular support, the reforms undertaken by the government under his leadership, and his ability to inspire the entire country.
Local Latvians in the province are actively organising and fomenting rebellion against Finnish rule.
This province is leased to the current owner.

In an absolute monarchy, Albesans will seek to impose a constitutional monarchy. Otherwise, Albesans will strive to create a democratic government with a liberal ideology and a focus on political reform.
As survivors and original inhabitants of our land, we do not attract alien immigrants, nor do we want them.
If we wish to survive among our hostile neighbours, we must have many sons to defend ourselves.
Pretend this doesn't exist, it's a workaround for code limitations.
For some reason, the minorities in this province are particularly rebellious at the moment.

With the defeat of their leaders in war and rising public discontent, the people have taken matters into their own hand to resolve the long-standing tensions and respond to local unrest due to war exhaustion and mismanagement by their state. The goal is to unify with the winner of the war.
Until Michael comes of age, he will be assisted in his rule by a regent.

The power of the king of Poland is checked by the Sejm, a sort of legislature of the nobility, who continue to be the majority landholders in the country. Their willingness to accept royal decrees and rule depends on a number of factors, such as the attitude of the king toward the body and his relationship with them. It is a staunchly conservative body, against liberalism and anything else that threatens the power of the nobility.

Hungarian nobility are holding meetings at their estates to discuss and debate liberal theories. Word about these is spreading and contributing to a rising sense of nationalism among the upper classes. This will surely filter down to the lower classes, too.
In the wake of the publishing of Gogol's "Dead Souls," the government has attempted to make some reforms to improve productivity and reduce corruption. It has largely been successful.
Pretend this doesn't exist, it's a workaround for code limitations.
We are being provided with European experts in various field of technology to aid our progress in adopting their technology and systems.
Dear Father Tsar - The Tsar looks over us and protects us, a father to the whole Empire!
In the wake of the publishing of Gogol's "Dead Souls," the government has attempted to make some reforms to improve productivity and reduce corruption. It has largely been unsuccessful.
For some reason, the minorities in this province are extremely rebellious at the moment!
With only one major city under our rule, our nation is easily overlooked.
Our nation governs less territory than most.
Ours is a large nation, a power to be reckoned with.
Ours is one of the largest nations in the world, a power to be reckoned with.

This is an era of change. The past two decades of wars and failed revolutions were just the beginning. The Hispanian Revolution of the 1820s hardened the hearts of Europe's royalty against the liberal cause. The Imperial War (1829-1835) saw the dissolution of the Holy Roman Empire, leaving a gaping hole in Europe. The ossified political and social structures of Old Europe will no doubt be swept away as well. No matter who you are, there are riches and glory to be had in this age of upheaval, if only you have the vision to claim them. Choose your nation and guide it to its destiny!
Acquire the German state of $STATE$ from $RECIPIENT$
Claim a state belonging to another German ruler and incorporate it into your realm, bringing you one step closer to hegemony in Germany.
Acquire the German state of $STATE$ from $RECIPIENT$
Claim the last state belonging to another German ruler and incorporate it into your realm, bringing you one step closer to hegemony in Germany.
Reclaim this §Ystate§W which rightfully belongs to us!
Choose §YSkåne§W from the list to the right.
Release Latvia from the clutches of the Finns, granting you an ally and weakening Finnish power.
Conquer $RECIPIENT$ to unite Russia once and for all.
It is time to unite the Great Russian people and put an end to the centuries-long stalemate between our two countries.
Acquire a part of our neighbour and make strides towards their ultimate defeat.

It is time to unite the Great Russian people and put an end to the centuries-long stalemate between our two countries. First we must cause their people and rulers to understand that further resistance is futile.
